comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in seal script and explanatory annotations in regular script. The text is arranged vertically from right to left, typical of classical Chinese texts. It includes entries with characters, their pronunciations (using fanqie method), meanings, and etymological notes. The rightmost column contains page numbers and section identifiers: '小四百三十一' (small 400-311), '言文十四下' (Speech Text 14 lower), and '嚴華' (Yan Hua, possibly a publisher or editor).
